chunks.text:
mi <Ali.Beyyumi@chalhoub.com>; Erika Raskeviciute <Erika.Raskeviciute@chalhoub.com>; Gidgette Delicana <Gidgette.Delicana@chalhoub.com>; Chalhoub Procurement <Chalhoub.Procurement@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-17 17:08
Subject: Follow-up: Procurement Town Hall & Policy Review
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Thank you for attending the recent Procurement Town Hall. We kindly request you to review the Group Procurement Policy <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/policy/group-procurement-policy/search?MTM3MA%3D%3D&t=MjQw> , accessible via OneReach. 

 

For your reference, the presentation deck from the session is also attached.

 

For any clarification or support regarding the policy or related processes, please feel free to reach out to me or any member of the Procurement team- we’ll be happy to assist you.

 

Thank you for your continued support.

SANGEETHA ABRAHAM	
​​​​	
MANAGER ‑ PROCUREMENT	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
		
 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 	
CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 
	
‑
